org.md2k.datakit.message

Class MessageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.md2k.datakit.message.MessageController

  • public class MessageController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls program flow based on messages.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MessageController getInstance(android.content.Context context)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Returns this instance of the MessageController.

        If an instance doesn't already exist, it creates one.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the MessageController.

        Logs the closing, closes privacyManager, and sets instance to null.

      • execute

        public android.os.Message execute(android.os.Message incomingMessage)
        Executes an action based on the incoming message.

        These message types bundle any relevant data and prepare another message.

        • REGISTER
        • UNREGISTER
        • SUBSCRIBE
        • UNSUBSCRIBE
        • FIND
        • QUERYSIZE
        • QUERY
        • QUERYPRIMARYKEY

        INSERT, INSERT_HIGH_FREQUENCY, and SUMMARY call the corresponding methods in PrivacyManager.

        Parameters:
        incomingMessage - Message incoming from the handler.
        Returns:
        A new message or null.

      • prepareMessage

        public android.os.Message prepareMessage(android.os.Message incomingMessage,
                                         android.os.Bundle bundle)
        Prepares a message from an incoming message and a bundle.
        Parameters:
        incomingMessage - Message incoming from the handler.
        bundle - Bundle of data to add to the message.
        Returns:
        The prepped message.
